H0.text: What colour are the berries of the mistletoe plant. Red

H1.text: What colour are the berries of the mistletoe plant. Purple

H2.text: What colour are the berries of the mistletoe plant. Green

H3.text: What colour are the berries of the mistletoe plant. White

A4.text: European mistletoe has waxy, white berries.

A6.text: The fruit is a white or yellow berry, and except for very rarely, contains one seed embedded in the very sticky, glutinous fruit pulp.
